answers.answer: Thats good! Your body needs tons of water. I drink a lot more now too. Your amniotic fluid is replaced ever three hours. Keep drinking water lol.
I'm always drinking a lot of water to! Lol..  no matter how much I drink I always feel like I'm dehydrated!! An I'm 30w3d
In rare occasions could be early signs of diabetes or just dehydration. Either way make sure your Dr knows.
At that time during my pregnancy that's all I could drink. Nothing else would satisfy my thirst. Now I am 10 weeks and have been able to drink sprite but that's it. Good luck.

question: Why am I constantly drinking water? I am 5 weeks and 4 days pregnant but im drinking two litres of water a day. What's that about?
title: thirsy
